Class AbstractService<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.surodev.fms.service.AbstractService<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - one of Ship, Owner, Category
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryService, OwnerService, ShipService

    public abstract class AbstractService<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that will allow faster implementation of the services
